about: Quiz with pictures is the intellectual game. You should guess the word using it's description only. Players have only 40 seconds to guess the word. Player, who give first correct answer take game points: 3 - without hints, 2 - with one hint and 1 - without hint. The right answer will showed with relative picture.
meta-description: Quiz with pictures is the intellectual game. You should guess the word using it's description only. The right answer will showed with relative picture.
